text: Nguyễn Cao Kỳ (8 September 1930–23 July 2011) was a South Vietnamese military leader, politician and Prime Minister of the Republic of Vietnam in a military junta from 1965 to 1967.Mydans, Seth. "Nguyen Cao Ky, South Vietnam Leader, Dies at 80," New York Times (US). July 23, 2011; retrieved 2011-10-23. == References == ==Other websites== *Speech by General Nguyen Cao Ky *Buddha's Child: My Fight to Save Vietnam by General Nguyen Cao Ky *Book Review "Buddha's Child: My Fight to Save Vietnam" by the Washington Post *Who's Who in Vietnam in 1967 |- |- |- Category:1930 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Vietnam Category:People from Hanoi
title: Nguyen Cao Ky
